title: The Hotwife Collection: Three Stories Of Cuckolds And Their Wives
description: Three women, three steamy situations! These three women aren't just going to lie back and take the hand that life dealt them. They're going to get out there and take what's rightfully theirs - whatever their husbands might think!The Hotwife's Revenge: Upon discovering proof of her husband's infidelity, a wife sets out to make a real cuckold of him.The Horny Housewife: What's a bored housewife to do when her husband can't satisfy all her needs? Cynthia has a naughty little morning routine that her husband is blissfully unaware of -- or is he?The Hotwife Videos: Tony comes home to find that someone has delivered him unmarked videotapes. Curious, he puts them on, only to find that his wife is the star!
author: Cindy Cumby
